sentences.en: Check the plant for any visible signs of disease.
sentences.cn: 检查一下植物是否有患病的迹象。

sentences.en: He was making a visible effort to control himself.
sentences.cn: 他明显是在努力控制自己的情绪。

sentences.en: Her hand was just visible by the light from the sitting room.
sentences.cn: 借着起居室的灯光，勉强能看见她的手。

sentences.en: In the UK visible imports have traditionally been greater than visible exports.
sentences.cn: 在英国，传统上有形产品的进口一直大于出口。

sentences.en: One policeman was clearly visible noting the number plates of passing cars.
sentences.cn: 能清楚地看到一名警察记下了经过车辆的车牌号。

sentences.en: Only a tiny patch of blue was visible in the cloudy sky.
sentences.cn: 多云的天空中只见到一小块儿湛蓝.

sentences.en: Only here were the police visible in any strength at all.
sentences.cn: 只有在这里才能看到廖廖几个警察。
毛孔无须放大就可以看见。

sentences.en: The comet is visible to the naked eye (= can be seen without using special equipment ).
The expulsion of dust from the volcano was visible from miles away.
sentences.cn: 火山喷出的灰尘几英里之外就能看得见.

sentences.en: The face is the true self visible to others.
sentences.cn: 这副面孔是他人所能见到的自我真实的一面。

sentences.en: The first signs of economic decline became visible.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退的最初迹象开始显现出来。

sentences.en: The house is clearly visible from the beach.
sentences.cn: 从海滩可以清楚地看到那所房子。

sentences.en: The planet Mars will be visible to the naked eye all week.
sentences.cn: 整周都可以用肉眼观察到火星。

sentences.en: The sea was plainly visible in the distance.
The water is clear and plenty of fish are visible.
sentences.cn: 水清澈见底，能看见许多鱼。

sentences.en: They found a bacterium visible to the human eye.
sentences.cn: 他们发现了一种肉眼可见的细菌。

words.tran_cn: 能见度，可见性；能见距离；明显性
视力；美景；眼力；幻象；想象力
显而易见的,清晰的,引人注目的

phrases.tran_cn: 可见激光；可见激光器；可见镭射

trans.tran_en: something that is visible can be seen

trans.tran_cn: 可见物；进出口贸易中的有形项目
